DOC.brief_summary: The Zenith TX2® Post-market Approval Study clinical trial approve US FDA study safety effectiveness Zenith TX2® TAA Endovascular Graft treatment thoracic aortic aneurysm .
DOC.criteria: Descending thoracic aortic aneurysm diameter great equal 5.0 cm ; Descending thoracic aortic aneurysm history growth great equal 0.5 cm within previous 12 month ; Descending thoracic aortic degenerative atherosclerotic ulcer great equal 10 mm depth 20 mm diameter Age le 18 year Other medical condition may cause patient noncompliant protocol , confound result , associate limited life expectancy ( i.e. , less 2 year ) Pregnant , breastfeeding , plan become pregnant within 24 month Unwilling unable comply followup schedule Inability refusal give inform consent Simultaneously participate another investigative device drug study
